## Carry Recipe
_Double Hammock Tied at Shoulder – Base Size Minus 1 – 2 Traditional Sling Passes + Bunched Torso Pass_

- Off center Traditional Sling Pass over baby on back with short tail over shoulder
- Spread chest pass with long tail
- Traditional Sling Pass over baby
- Take tail under arm in bunched Torso Pass over baby’s legs
- Tie at shoulder/Knotless/Candy cane chest belt
